sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Only Education was facing the complex task of asserting credibility and visibility in an oversaturated EdTech environment...

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit delivered a comprehensive brand overhaul with ad films, SEO, LinkedIn strategy, and automated marketing workflows...

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Only Education saw a 65% uplift in keyword visibility, 90% boost in engagement, and a unified digital presence.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: NEETGyan, despite having substantial educational content, struggled to compete in the crowded NEET preparation market...

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit implemented NEET-specific SEO, keyword targeting, Core Web Vitals improvement, and academic backlinks...

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: 50% organic traffic increase, top 3 keyword ranks, and surge in course sign-ups.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Despite culinary mastery, The Kerala Table lacked cohesive digital storytelling and underperformed online...

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit executed a full digital transformation: HD photography, Reels, ASMR content, SEO, influencer marketing...

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: 70% search visibility growth, 55% traffic spike, and 80% rise in IG engagement...

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Only Engineering struggled to gain high-intent traffic despite valuable mock tests and content...

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit implemented SEO, schema optimization, technical performance fixes, and link building...

sections.heading: The Impact

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: MBA CET had weak SEO and low visibility in a competitive MBA prep space...

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit ran long-tail keyword research, structured data, mobile usability, and semantic content upgrades...

sections.description: 38% rise in traffic, improved rankings and engagement across course pages...

sections.heading: The Challenge

sections.heading: The Challenge

sections.heading: The Challenge
